attributes.action: Motorway Closure limited to a maximum of one hour between 6am and 10pm after an event
attributes.additional_details:
Legislate to prevent complete closure of either carriageway of a motorway.
A carriageway could only be closed for maximum period of one hour in the event of an accident or incident between 6am and 10pm after which a minimum of one lane must be reopened.
The legislation would exclude tunnels and major bridges.
